verses.verse: And when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> Moses <WH4872> delayed <WH954> to come down <WH3381> out of <WH4480> the mount, <WH2022> the people <WH5971> gathered themselves together <WH6950> unto <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Up, <WH6965> make <WH6213> us gods, <WH430> which <WH834> shall go <WH1980> before <WH6440> us; for <WH3588> as for this <WH2088> Moses, <WH4872> the man <WH376> that <WH834> brought us up <WH5927> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> we know <WH3045> not <WH3808> what <WH4100> is become <WH1961> of him.

And Aaron <WH175> said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Break off <WH6561> the golden <WH2091> earrings, <WH5141> which <WH834> are in the ears <WH241> of your wives, <WH802> of your sons, <WH1121> and of your daughters, <WH1323> and bring <WH935> them unto <WH413> me.
And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> broke off <WH6561> <WH853> the golden <WH2091> earrings <WH5141> which <WH834> were in their ears, <WH241> and brought <WH935> them unto <WH413> Aaron. <WH175>

And he received <WH3947> them at their hand, <WH4480> <WH3027> and fashioned <WH6696> it with a graving tool, <WH2747> after he had made <WH6213> it a molten <WH4541> calf: <WH5695> and they said, <WH559> These <WH428> be thy gods, <WH430> O Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> brought thee up <WH5927> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And when Aaron <WH175> saw <WH7200> it, he built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> before <WH6440> it; and Aaron <WH175> made proclamation, <WH7121> and said, <WH559> Tomorrow <WH4279> is a feast <WH2282> to the LORD. <WH3068>

And they rose up early <WH7925> on the morrow, <WH4480> <WH4283> and offered <WH5927> burnt offerings, <WH5930> and brought <WH5066> peace offerings; <WH8002> and the people <WH5971> sat down <WH3427> to eat <WH398> and to drink, <WH8354> and rose up <WH6965> to play. <WH6711>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Go, <WH1980> get thee down; <WH3381> for <WH3588> thy people, <WH5971> which <WH834> thou broughtest <WH5927> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> have corrupted <WH7843> themselves:

They have turned aside <WH5493> quickly <WH4118> out of <WH4480> the way <WH1870> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> them: they have made <WH6213> them a molten <WH4541> calf, <WH5695> and have worshiped <WH7812> it, and have sacrificed <WH2076> thereunto, and said, <WH559> These <WH428> be thy gods, <WH430> O Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> have brought thee up <WH5927> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> I have seen <WH7200> <WH853> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> and, behold, <WH2009> it <WH1931> is a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people: <WH5971>

Now <WH6258> therefore let me alone, <WH5117> that my wrath <WH639> may wax hot <WH2734> against them, and that I may consume <WH3615> them: and I will make <WH6213> of thee a great <WH1419> nation. <WH1471>

And Moses <WH4872> besought <WH2470> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> his God, <WH430> and said, <WH559> LORD, <WH3068> why <WH4100> doth thy wrath <WH639> wax hot <WH2734> against thy people, <WH5971> which <WH834> thou hast brought forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with great <WH1419> power, <WH3581> and with a mighty <WH2389> hand? <WH3027>

Wherefore <WH4100> should the Egyptians <WH4714> speak, <WH559> and say, <WH559> For mischief <WH7451> did he bring them out, <WH3318> to slay <WH2026> them in the mountains, <WH2022> and to consume <WH3615> them from <WH4480> <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth? <WH127> Turn <WH7725> from thy fierce wrath, <WH4480> <WH2740> <WH639> and repent <WH5162> of <WH5921> this evil <WH7451> against thy people. <WH5971>

Remember <WH2142> Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Israel, <WH3478> thy servants, <WH5650> to whom <WH834> thou sworest <WH7650> by thine own self, and saidst <WH1696> unto <WH413> them, I will multiply <WH7235> <WH853> your seed <WH2233> as the stars <WH3556> of heaven, <WH8064> and all <WH3605> this <WH2063> land <WH776> that <WH834> I have spoken <WH559> of will I give <WH5414> unto your seed, <WH2233> and they shall inherit <WH5157> it forever. <WH5769>
And the LORD <WH3068> repented <WH5162> of <WH5921> the evil <WH7451> which <WH834> he thought <WH1696> to do <WH6213> unto his people. <WH5971>

And Moses <WH4872> turned, <WH6437> and went down <WH3381> from <WH4480> the mount, <WH2022> and the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of the testimony <WH5715> were in his hand: <WH3027> the tables <WH3871> were written <WH3789> on both <WH4480> <WH8147> their sides; <WH5676> on the one side <WH4480> <WH2088> and on the other <WH4480> <WH2088> were they <WH1992> written. <WH3789>
And the tables <WH3871> were the work <WH4639> of God, <WH430> and the writing <WH4385> was the writing <WH4385> of God, <WH430> graven <WH2801> upon <WH5921> the tables. <WH3871>

And when Joshua <WH3091> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the noise <WH6963> of the people <WH5971> as they shouted, <WH7452> he said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> There is a noise <WH6963> of war <WH4421> in the camp. <WH4264>

And he said, <WH559> It is not <WH369> the voice <WH6963> of them that shout <WH6030> for mastery, <WH1369> neither <WH369> is it the voice <WH6963> of them that cry <WH6030> for being overcome: <WH2476> but the noise <WH6963> of them that sing <WH6031> do I <WH595> hear. <WH8085>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> as soon as <WH834> he came nigh <WH7126> unto <WH413> the camp, <WH4264> that he saw <WH7200> <WH853> the calf, <WH5695> and the dancing: <WH4246> and Moses' <WH4872> anger <WH639> waxed hot, <WH2734> and he cast <WH7993> <WH853> the tables <WH3871> out of his hands, <WH4480> <WH3027> and broke <WH7665> them beneath <WH8478> the mount. <WH2022>

And he took <WH3947> <WH853> the calf <WH5695> which <WH834> they had made, <WH6213> and burnt <WH8313> it in the fire, <WH784> and ground <WH2912> it to <WH5704> powder, <WH834> <WH1854> and strewed <WH2219> it upon <WH5921> <WH6440> the water, <WH4325> and made <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> drink <WH8248> of it.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> What <WH4100> did <WH6213> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> unto thee, that <WH3588> thou hast brought <WH935> so great <WH1419> a sin <WH2401> upon <WH5921> them?

And Aaron <WH175> said, <WH559> Let not <WH408> the anger <WH639> of my lord <WH113> wax hot: <WH2734> thou <WH859> knowest <WH3045> <WH853> the people, <WH5971> that <WH3588> they <WH1931> are set on mischief. <WH7451>

For they said <WH559> unto me, Make <WH6213> us gods, <WH430> which <WH834> shall go <WH1980> before <WH6440> us: for <WH3588> as for this <WH2088> Moses, <WH4872> the man <WH376> that <WH834> brought us up <WH5927> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> we know <WH3045> not <WH3808> what <WH4100> is become <WH1961> of him.

And I said <WH559> unto them, Whosoever <WH4310> hath any gold, <WH2091> let them break it off. <WH6561> So they gave <WH5414> it me: then I cast <WH7993> it into the fire, <WH784> and there came out <WH3318> this <WH2088> calf. <WH5695>

And when Moses <WH4872> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> <WH853> the people <WH5971> were naked; <WH6544> (for <WH3588> Aaron <WH175> had made them naked <WH6544> unto their shame <WH8103> among their enemies: ) <WH6965>

Then Moses <WH4872> stood <WH5975> in the gate <WH8179> of the camp, <WH4264> and said, <WH559> Who <WH4310> is on the LORD's <WH3068> side? let him come unto <WH413> me. And all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> gathered themselves together <WH622> unto <WH413> him.

And he said <WH559> unto them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> Put <WH7760> every man <WH376> his sword <WH2719> by <WH5921> his side, <WH3409> and go in <WH5674> and out <WH7725> from gate <WH4480> <WH8179> to gate <WH8179> throughout the camp, <WH4264> and slay <WH2026> every man <WH376> <WH853> his brother, <WH251> and every man <WH376> <WH853> his companion, <WH7453> and every man <WH376> <WH853> his neighbor. <WH7138>

And the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> did <WH6213> according to the word <WH1697> of Moses: <WH4872> and there fell <WH5307> of <WH4480> the people <WH5971> that <WH1931> day <WH3117> about three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> men. <WH376>

For Moses <WH4872> had said, <WH559> Consecrate <WH4390> <WH3027> yourselves today <WH3117> to the LORD, <WH3068> even <WH3588> every man <WH376> upon his son, <WH1121> and upon his brother; <WH251> that he may bestow <WH5414> upon <WH5921> you a blessing <WH1293> this day. <WH3117>

And it came to pass <WH1961> on the morrow, <WH4480> <WH4283> that Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the people, <WH5971> Ye <WH859> have sinned <WH2398> a great <WH1419> sin: <WH2401> and now <WH6258> I will go up <WH5927> unto <WH413> the LORD; <WH3068> peradventure <WH194> I shall make an atonement <WH3722> for <WH1157> your sin. <WH2403>

And Moses <WH4872> returned <WH7725> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> Oh, <WH577> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> have sinned <WH2398> a great <WH1419> sin, <WH2401> and have made <WH6213> them gods <WH430> of gold. <WH2091>

Yet now, <WH6258> if <WH518> thou wilt forgive <WH5375> their sin; <WH2403> and if <WH518> not, <WH369> blot <WH4229> me, I pray thee, <WH4994> out of thy book <WH4480> <WH5612> which <WH834> thou hast written. <WH3789>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Whosoever <WH4310> <WH834> hath sinned <WH2398> against me, him will I blot out <WH4229> of my book. <WH4480> <WH5612>

Therefore now <WH6258> go, <WH1980> lead <WH5148> <WH853> the people <WH5971> unto <WH413> the place of which <WH834> I have spoken <WH1696> unto thee: behold, <WH2009> mine Angel <WH4397> shall go <WH1980> before <WH6440> thee: nevertheless in the day <WH3117> when I visit <WH6485> I will visit <WH6485> their sin <WH2403> upon <WH5921> them.
And the LORD <WH3068> plagued <WH5062> <WH853> the people, <WH5971> because <WH5921> <WH834> they made <WH6213> <WH853> the calf, <WH5695> which <WH834> Aaron <WH175> made. <WH6213>
